title: Job Vacancies at ABM Tek Limited
content:
ABM Tek Limited is a leading provider of automotive services with a commitment to excellence in vehicle maintenance, repair, and customer service. Our team of experienced professionals takes pride in delivering top-notch solutions for Mercedes, Honda, Toyota, and Volkswagen vehicles.

We are recruiting to fill the following positions below:

1.) Mercedes Benz - Mechanic

Job Location: Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time (On-site)

About the Role
     

            
    




	We are seeking an experienced Mercedes-Benz Mechanic responsible for diagnosing, repairing, and maintaining Mercedes-Benz vehicles to factory standards.
	The ideal candidate must have strong mechanical knowledge of modern Mercedes systems and engines.


Key Responsibilities


	Diagnose mechanical faults using Mercedes-specific diagnostic tools (Xentry or equivalent).
	Carry out engine, transmission, suspension, brake, and drivetrain repairs.
	Perform routine servicing (oil change, filters, belts, spark plugs, etc.).
	Work on Mercedes engines 
	Maintain a clean, organized, and safe work environment.
	Accurately document repairs and parts used.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications 3–5 years of experience working on Mercedes-Benz vehicles.
	Strong understanding of Mercedes mechanical systems.
	Ability to read wiring diagrams and service manuals.
	Experience with AMG models is an advantage.
	Technical certification is a plus.
	Attention to detail and problem-solving skills.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: abmteklimited@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

2.) Mercedes-Benz Auto Electrician

Job Location: Abuja
Employment Type: Full-time (On-site)

Job Summary


	We are looking for a skilled Mercedes-Benz Auto Electrician to diagnose and repair electrical and electronic systems in Mercedes vehicles, including advanced control modules and safety systems.


Key Responsibilities


	Diagnose electrical faults using Xentry or advanced scan tools.
	Repair wiring, CAN-Bus systems, sensors, actuators, and modules.
	Work on systems such as:
	Engine management
	ABS / ESP
	Airbag systems
	Airmatic & suspension electronics
	Infotainment & ambient lighting
	Perform ECU checks, coding, and module replacement.
	Identify parasitic drains and battery management faults.
	Repair lighting systems, keyless entry, and comfort modules.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications with 3–5 years of experience in Mercedes electrical diagnostics.
	Strong understanding of CAN-Bus and control modules.
	Ability to read Mercedes wiring diagrams.
	Experience with ECU coding is an advantage.
	High level of accuracy and patience.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: abmteklimited@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

3.) Toyota & Honda Mechanic

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)

Job Summary


	We are hiring a reliable Toyota & Honda Mechanic to service, diagnose, and repair Toyota and Honda vehicles efficiently and accurately.


Key Responsibilities


	Diagnose mechanical faults on Toyota and Honda vehicles.
	Perform engine repairs, suspension work, brake repairs, and transmission servicing.
	Carry out routine maintenance (servicing, timing systems, cooling systems).
	Work on petrol and hybrid engines.
	Identify engine noises, overheating, and performance issues.
	Test vehicles before and after repairs.
	Maintain service records and job reports.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications.
	3 - 5 years of experience with Toyota and Honda vehicles.
	Strong understanding of Japanese engine systems.
	Ability to work independently with minimal supervision.
	Experience with hybrid systems is an advantage.
	Good work ethic and time management skills.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: abmteklimited@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

 

 

4.) Toyota & Honda Auto Electrician

Job Location: Abuja (FCT)

Job Summary


	We are seeking a skilled Toyota & Honda Auto Electrician to handle electrical diagnostics, wiring repairs, and electronic system maintenance.


Key Responsibilities


	Diagnose electrical and electronic faults using scan tools.
	Repair wiring looms, sensors, relays, and ECUs.
	Work on systems including:
	Engine management
	ABS & airbags
	Power windows & central locking
	Dashboard & instrument clusters
	Diagnose starting, charging, and battery issues.
	Install and troubleshoot aftermarket accessories.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess relevant qualifications.
	3 - 5 years of experience as an auto electrician.
	Strong understanding of Toyota & Honda electrical systems.
	Ability to read wiring diagrams.
	Experience with immobilizers and key systems is an advantage.
	Detail-oriented and safety-conscious.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: abmteklimited@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

Supply Planner Job at Seven Up Bottling Company Limited




        
    

        
        Seven Up Bottling Company Limited is one of the largest manufacturing companies in Nigeria, producing and distributing some of the nation’s most- loved beverages in the country like; Pepsi, 7Up, Mirinda, Teem, Mountain Dew, H2oH!, Lipton Ice Tea and Aquafina premium drinking water. SBC has recently entered into Home & Personal Care category with the 2SURE brand and launched its first product, a Hand & Surface Sanitizer. Seven Up boasts of nine bottling plants with state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities strategically located across various regions in the country.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Supply Planner

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
     

            
    



Responsibilities


	Determine and supervise production requirements based on plant capacity and production specifications weekly, monthly and yearly.
	Responsible for translation of demand to production; determine materials and manpower required to complete production.
	Manage demand and supply of full goods, Identify delays and changes in plans, and adjust production/ supply plan accordingly.
	Monitor production status and ensure timely delivery.
	Assist in production risk assessment and mitigation activities.
	Assess and manage all full goods on a daily basis and assist team members to manage all production schedules.
	Manage an efficient inventory level of all safety stock and review all volume requirements for all production materials.
	Prepare budget and oversee expenditures of full goods
	Determine, monitor and manage planned versus actual sales plan.
	Monitor the notification of “Phase in, phase out” process of products.
	Responsible for all full goods


Requirements


	Bachelor's degree. Preferably in a numerical field.
	Minimum of 3 years of cognate experience, preferably within the FMCG industry is a MUST
	Intermediate to Expert level proficiency in the Microsoft Suite, especially Excel.


Method of Application

Business Manager Job at Renuzi Ventures




        
    

        
        Renuzi Ventures is a Nigerian company specializing in Fast-Moving Consumer Goods (FMCG) distribution in Lagos, connecting major brands like Unilever with thousands of retailers for efficient supply, logistics, and stock management, ensuring businesses don't run out of popular products. They operate under names like Renuzi Swift and Renuzi Adventures, focusing on reliable delivery, strong warehousing, and supporting Lagos businesses.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Business Manager

Job Locations: Ketu, Ajah and Lekki 1, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Fast-Moving Consumer Goods (FMCG)

About the Company
     

            
    




	We are a growing FMCG company engaged in the production, sales, and distribution of consumer goods across multiple markets.
	As part of our expansion strategy, we are seeking an experienced and results-oriented Business Manager to drive sales growth, manage operations, and strengthen market presence.


Key Responsibilities
Business & Sales Management:


	Develop and implement business strategies to drive revenue growth and market expansion.
	Oversee sales operations, distribution channels, and key customer relationships.
	Monitor sales performance, targets, and KPIs across regions and channels.
	Identify new business opportunities, markets, and partnerships.
	Ensure effective pricing, promotion, and product placement strategies.


Operations & Team Leadership:


	Supervise sales, marketing, and operational teams to ensure efficiency and productivity.
	Coordinate with production, logistics, and warehouse teams to ensure product availability.
	Ensure compliance with company policies, internal controls, and operational standards.
	Prepare business reports, forecasts, and performance updates for management.


Financial & Strategic Oversight:


	Manage budgets, control costs, and improve profitability.
	Track expenses, margins, and return on investment across business activities.
	Analyze market trends, competitor activities, and consumer behavior.
	Provide strategic recommendations to management based on market insights.


Requirements & Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree / HND in Business Administration, Marketing, Economics, or a related field.
	Minimum of 5 - 8 years of experience in an FMCG, sales-driven, or consumer goods environment.
	Proven track record of meeting and exceeding sales and revenue targets.
	Strong knowledge of distribution networks, route-to-market, and trade marketing.
	Excellent leadership, negotiation, and analytical skills.
	Proficiency in Microsoft Office tools (especially Excel and PowerPoint).
	MBA or relevant professional certification is an added advantage.


What We Offer


	Competitive remuneration (N400,000 - N700,000 monthly) and performance-based incentives
	Opportunity to lead and influence business growth
	Career advancement in a dynamic FMCG environment
	Supportive and performance-oriented work culture.

Job Position: HR / Admin Officer

Job Locations: Ketu & Ojota Branch, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Fast-Moving Consumer Goods (FMCG)

About the Company
     

            
    




	We are a growing FMCG company engaged in the distribution of consumer goods across multiple channels.
	Due to expansion, we are seeking a result-driven HR/Admin Officer to support our people operations and ensure efficient administrative processes in a fast-paced distribution environment.
